text: Agios Ilias is a settlement in the municipality of Zacharo in southern Elis, Peloponnese, Greece. It was an independent community from 1912 until 1997. The postal code of Agios Ilias is 27054; its phone access number is +3026250. It is situated 2 km from the coast, and 9 km southeast of Zacharo. ==See also== *List of settlements in Elis ==References== ==External links== * Page of Agios Ilias settlement (Zacharo) Category:Populated places in Elis
title: Agios Ilias, Zacharo
